info: Originally, Skarlet was a character rumored to have been a secret in Mortal Kombat II, though this was speculated to be a coding glitch from Kitana, much like Ermac, who had supposedly been a color glitch from Scorpion.Scarlet is a devoted servant to Shao Kahn, her every action with the goal of appeasing her father.
